20101221020556.000|20101221020557.000|CC1|SHOCK.

20101221020613.000|20101221020613.000|CC1|RESIGN.

20101221020615.000|20101221020617.000|CC1|OF IT 29-MEMBER DEPARTMENT, AND 
20101221020617.000|20101221020620.000|CC1|HE WAS NOT A POPULAR FIGURE.    
20101221020620.000|20101221020622.000|CC1|RUMORS HE WOULD TRY TO TAKE     
20101221020622.000|20101221020623.000|CC1|APART THE POLICE DEPARTMENT     
20101221020623.000|20101221020626.000|CC1|WHICH DID NOT SIT WELL.         
20101221020626.000|20101221020628.000|CC1|WE WERE RIGHT AT HIS CAR.       
20101221020628.000|20101221020630.000|CC1|ALL OF A SUDDEN THE CAR WAS     
20101221020630.000|20101221020632.000|CC1|MOVED INTO THE CARPORT AND ADAMS
20101221020632.000|20101221020635.000|CC1|WAS ABLE TO AVOID THE MEDIA.    
20101221020635.000|20101221020636.000|CC1|WE STARTED TO SHOUT QUESTIONS,  
20101221020636.000|20101221020638.000|CC1|BUT HE IGNORED US, GOT INTO THE 
20101221020638.000|20101221020640.000|CC1|CAR, AND SPED AWAY.             
20101221020640.000|20101221020641.000|CC1|THE OBVIOUS QUESTION, WHY GIVE  
20101221020641.000|20101221020645.000|CC1|HIM PREFERENTIAL TREATMENT?     
20101221020645.000|20101221020647.000|CC1|>> IS THIS PREFERENTIAL         
20101221020647.000|20101221020647.000|CC1|TREATMENT?                      
20101221020647.000|20101221020648.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY NOT.              
20101221020648.000|20101221020650.000|CC1|I WOULD AFFORD THAT COURTESY TO 
20101221020650.000|20101221020652.000|CC1|ANY EMPLOYEE OF THE POLICE

20101221020652.000|20101221020656.000|CC1|>> HE IS NO OTHER -- HE IS NO   
20101221020656.000|20101221020657.000|CC1|LONGER AN EMPLOYEE.             
20101221020657.000|20101221020659.000|CC1|>> MY POLICY IS YOU GIVE HIM THE
20101221020659.000|20101221020702.000|CC1|PRIVACY OF LETTING HIM GET HIS  
20101221020702.000|20101221020704.000|CC1|STUFF AND LEAVE.

20101221020705.000|20101221020707.000|CC1|YOU DO THE SAME FOR RIZZO?      
20101221020707.000|20101221020710.000|CC1|>> HE DOESN'T WORK IN THE POLICE
20101221020710.000|20101221020710.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT.                     
20101221020710.000|20101221020715.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE OBVIOUS        
20101221020715.000|20101221020718.000|CC1|REFERENCE TO ROBERT RIZZO.      
20101221020718.000|20101221020719.000|CC1|MAKING $850,000 A YEAR WHEN HE  
20101221020719.000|20101221020722.000|CC1|AND THE SO-CALLED BELL EIGHT    
20101221020722.000|20101221020723.000|CC1|WERE ALL INDICTED.              
20101221020723.000|20101221020724.000|CC1|NOW FACING MORE THAN 55 YEARS
